00073 void nodeSleep(u16 tenthSeconds)
00074 {
00075     // Check to see if we really should sleep
00076     if (!macConfig.sleeping)
00077         // Just return, rather than sleeping
00078         return;
00079 
00080     // ************** Power down the other board peripherals
00081     LED_OFF(1);
00082 
00083     // ************** Power down the radio
00084     // wait for radio to be done
00085     u8 state = BUSY_TX_ARET;
00086     while (state == BUSY_TX_ARET ||
00087            state == BUSY_RX_AACK)
00088         state = radioGetTrxState();
00089 
00090     // Now put radio to sleep
00091     radioEnterSleepMode();
00092 
00093     // ************** Power down the on-chip modules
00094     if (PLATFORM == SPITFIRE)
00095         PRR = 0xbf;
00096     else if (PLATFORM != DSK001)
00097     {
00098         // Disable ADC
00099         ADCSRA &= ~(1 << ADEN);
00100         // Turn off comparator
00101         ACSR |= (1 << ACD);
00102 
00103         PRR0 = 0xaf;  // shutdown all but timer2
00104         PRR1 = 0xff;  // shutdown all of these peripherals
00105     }
00106 
00107     // For Raven, turn off more stuff
00108     if (PLATFORM == RAVEN)
00109     {
00110         // Turn off GPIO's
00111         DDRA  = 0;
00112         PORTA = 0xff;
00113         // PB0 = TST, leave
00114         // PB1 = RST, leave
00115         // PB2 = unused, in high
00116         // PB3 = slptr, leave
00117         // PB4 = sel, leave
00118         // PB5 - PB7, leave
00119         PORTB |= 1 << 2;
00120 
00121         // Put 24C02 in standby:
00122         DDRC = 0;
00123         PORTC = 0xff;
00124         //        DDRD &= ~0xbf;
00125         PORTD |= 0xbf; // All but PD6, which is IRQ from radio
00126 
00127         // Turn off BOD
00128         AVR_ENTER_CRITICAL_REGION();
00129 #define BODS  6
00130 #define BODSE 5
00131         MCUCR  |= (1 << BODSE) | (1<< BODS);
00132         MCUCR  &= ~(1 << BODSE);
00133         AVR_LEAVE_CRITICAL_REGION();
00134     }
00135 
00136     // Turn off all extra ports on SPITFIRE
00137     if (PLATFORM == SPITFIRE)
00138     {
00139         // Pull open pins high
00140         PORTC |= 0x0f;
00141         PORTD |= 0x47;
00142     }
00143 
00144     if (PLATFORM == DSK001)
00145     {
00146         // Turn off accelerometer
00147         DDRC  |=  0x0f;
00148         PORTC &= ~0x0f;
00149         // Make all pins zero or one
00150         DDRB |= 1;
00151         PORTB &= ~1;
00152         DDRD = 0xff;
00153         PORTD = 0x80;
00154         // Turn off BOD
00155         AVR_ENTER_CRITICAL_REGION();
00156         MCUCR  |=  (1 << BODSE) | (1 << BODS);
00157         MCUCR  |=  (1 << BODS);
00158         MCUCR  &= ~(1 << BODSE);
00159         AVR_LEAVE_CRITICAL_REGION();
00160 
00161         // Turn off ADC
00162         if (ADC_ENABLED)
00163         {
00164             //            HAL_WAIT_ADC();
00165             HAL_STOP_ADC();
00166         }
00167 
00168         // Turn off all modules, except timer2
00169         PRR = 0xbf;
00170     }
00171 
00172 
00173     // ************** Set the timer to wake up
00174     if (!WDOG_SLEEP)
00175     {
00176         // Set TIMER2 Asyncronous Mode.
00177         ASSR |= (1 << AS2);
00178         // Set TIMER2 Prescaler to 1024.
00179         TCCR2B |= ((1 << CS22)|(1 << CS21)|(1 << CS20));
00180         // Wait for TCNT2 write to finish.
00181         while(ASSR & (1 << TCR2BUB))
00182             ;
00183     }
00184 
00185     // Sleep as many times as needed to sleep for the full time
00186     while (tenthSeconds)
00187     {
00188         if (WDOG_SLEEP)
00189         {
00190             u8 time;
00191             // Set Watchdog timer for max time left
00192             if (tenthSeconds >= 80)
00193             {
00194                 // 8 seconds
00195                 time = WDTO_8S;
00196                 tenthSeconds -= 80;
00197             }
00198             else if (tenthSeconds >= 40)
00199             {
00200                 // 4 seconds
00201                 time = WDTO_4S;
00202                 tenthSeconds -= 40;
00203             }
00204             else if (tenthSeconds >= 20)
00205             {
00206                 // 2 seconds
00207                 time = WDTO_2S;
00208                 tenthSeconds -= 20;
00209             }
00210             else if (tenthSeconds >= 10)
00211             {
00212                 // 1 seconds
00213                 time = WDTO_1S;
00214                 tenthSeconds -= 10;
00215             }
00216             else if (tenthSeconds >= 5)
00217             {
00218                 // 0.5 seconds
00219                 time = WDTO_500MS;
00220                 tenthSeconds -= 5;
00221             }
00222             else if (tenthSeconds >= 2)
00223             {
00224                 // 0.25 seconds
00225                 time = WDTO_250MS;
00226                 tenthSeconds -= 2;
00227             }
00228             else
00229             {
00230                 // 0.1 seconds (or so) left
00231                 time = WDTO_120MS;
00232                 tenthSeconds = 0;
00233             }
00234 
00235             wdt_reset();
00236             wdt_enable(time);
00237 
00238             MCUSR = 0;// &= ~(1 << WDRF);
00239             AVR_ENTER_CRITICAL_REGION();
00240             WDTCSR |= (1 << WDCE) | (1 << WDE);
00241             WDTCSR |= 1 << WDIF;
00242             WDTCSR |= (1 << WDCE) | (1 << WDE);
00243             WDTCSR |= 1 << WDIE;
00244             WDTCSR |= (1 << WDCE) | (1 << WDE);
00245             WDTCSR &= ~(1 << WDE);
00246             wdt_reset();
00247             AVR_LEAVE_CRITICAL_REGION();
00248             MCUSR = 0;
00249         }
00250         else  // No WDOG, use 32KHz timer
00251         {
00252             // Set TIMER2 output compare register from user.
00253             if (tenthSeconds > 75)
00254             {
00255                 // Just decrement by the max timeout
00256                 OCR2A = 240; // 7.5 seconds, max timeout
00257                 tenthSeconds -= 75;
00258             }
00259             else
00260             {
00261                 // Can measure the remaining time in one timer cycle
00262 
00263                 tenthSeconds = tenthSeconds * 16 / 5;
00264                 if (!tenthSeconds)
00265                     tenthSeconds++;
00266                 OCR2A = tenthSeconds;
00267                 tenthSeconds = 0;
00268             }
00269             // Wait for OCR2 write to finish.
00270             while(ASSR & (1 << OCR2AUB))
00271                 ;
00272             // Reset TIMER2 timer counter value.
00273             TCNT2 = 0;
00274             // Wait for TCNT2 write to finish before entering sleep.
00275             while(ASSR & (1 << TCN2UB))
00276                 ;
00277 
00278             // Clear interrupt flag
00279             TIFR2 |= (1 << OCF2A);
00280             // Enable TIMER2 output compare interrupt.
00281             TIMSK2 |= (1 << OCIE2A);
00282         }
00283 
00284         // ************** Go to sleep
00285         AVR_ENTER_CRITICAL_REGION();
00286         set_sleep_mode(WDOG_SLEEP ? SLEEP_MODE_PWR_DOWN : SLEEP_MODE_PWR_SAVE);
00287         sleep_enable();
00288         sei();
00289         sleep_cpu();
00290         sleep_disable();
00291         AVR_LEAVE_CRITICAL_REGION();
00292 
00293         wdt_disable();
00294     }
00295 
00296     // ************** Awake now, wake up everything
00297     if (PLATFORM == SPITFIRE)
00298         PRR = 0x03;
00299     else if (PLATFORM == DSK001)
00300         PRR = 0x02;
00301     else
00302     {
00303         PRR0 = 0;
00304         PRR1 = 0;
00305     }
00306 
00307     if (SERIAL)
00308         serial_init(NULL);
00309 
00310 /*     if (PLATFORM == SPITFIRE) */
00311 /*         // Re-init TWI */
00312 /*         twiInit(); */
00313 
00314     if (ADC_ENABLED && macConfig.associated)
00315         HAL_INIT_ADC();
00316 
00317     // Bring SPI port back up (must re-init after sleep)
00318     hal_spi_init();
00319 
00320     // Wake up radio.
00321     radioLeaveSleepMode();
00322 
00323     // Set RF212 to 250KB mode.
00324     //radioSetup900();
00325 
00326     radioSetTrxState(PLL_ON);
00327 }

00333 ISR(TIMER2_COMPA_vect)
00334 {
00335     // Disable TIMER2 output compare interrupt.
00336     TIMSK2 &= ~(1 << OCIE2A);
00337 }

00342 ISR(WDT_vect)
00343 {
